articles.title: "True Act Of Democracy": US Singer Mary Millben Praises PM Modi For CAA - NDTV
articles.description: Acclaimed African-American singer Mary Millben on Friday took to social media to praise Prime Minister Narendra Modi for what she termed as "demonstrating compassionate leadership" through the implementation of the Citizen (Amendment) Act (CAA).
articles.content:
Mary Millben's remarks came after US said it is "closely monitoring" implementation of CAA
